name: Kudo Digital Solutions Pte. Ltd.
description: Provider of an online platform designed to help businesses to create opportunities to grow their current business through technology. The company's online platform offers to make cash payments through a network of electronic machines to purchase e-commerce products without a credit card, as well as transportation tickets, enabling users to shop online with a safe payment gateway.
